name: Five Nights At Jerpig's
description:
Yet another FNAF Clone / Fan-Game, nothing special.

A somewhat 1:1 recreation of the first Five Nights at Freddy's game featuring 3 guinea pigs and one hedgehog ( Note: not Sonic the Hedgehog. ). Complete with a custom night and star system.

Should play almost exactly like the original ( or at least I hope. )

Tested on a RTX 2060 Super, performance unknown on older systems, ( Deferred rendering with 1M vertices so make what you will with that. )

No I do not know why this exists.

Original file size and assets: 574MB, compressed to 82.2 MB in final build, 26MB compressed. I am cool.

TODO: Further bug testing, phone guy lines rerecorded.
